name: Requires Appropriate Rest
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Sigewinne, equip this card.
After Sigewinne equips this card, immediately use Rebound Hydrotherapy once.
After your Sigewinne, who has this card equipped, uses Rebound Hydrotherapy: Your next 2 instances of Elemental Skill or Summon DMG deal +1 DMG.
(You must have Sigewinne in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1213]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1213] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12132]</color> once.
After your $[A1213], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S12132]</color>: Your next 2 instances of Elemental Skill or Summon DMG deal +1 DMG.
(You must have $[A1213] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sigewinne</color>, equip this card.
After Sigewinne equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Rebound Hydrotherapy</color> once.
After your Sigewinne, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Rebound Hydrotherapy</color>: Your next 2 instances of Elemental Skill or Summon DMG deal +1 DMG.
(You must have Sigewinne in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Sigewinne to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
